structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases

law.catch_line: Actions For Damages, Etc. For Physical Alteration Or Destruction Of Fine Art
law.text: Actions commenced under the provisions of section eighty-five S of chapter two hundred and thirty-one shall be commenced only within two years next after the cause of action accrues, or within one year next after the discovery of the act, whichever is later.
